name: Kimulator 2: The Bottle Flip Master
description: In this game, you will play the role of a French Canadian, in his quest to kill Adolf Hitler with the help of Jesus himself! Will he survive? Will he betray everyone he loved? Will he kill himself? All of this is up to you, in the sequel to Kimulator!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Xp / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: *It can work on almost any pc*
